member.name: IAppxBundleWriter3.AddPackageReference
member.summary: Adds a reference to an optional app package or a payload file within an app bundle.
member.param: The name of the payload file. The file name path must be relative to the root of the package.
An that provides the contents of fileName.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IAppxBundleWriter3.Close
member.summary: Finalizes the bundle package by writing footprint files at the end of the package, and closes the writer’s output stream.
member.param: The string value of the HashMethod attribute of the BlockMap root element.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IAppxBundleWriter3
member.summary: Provides a write-only object model for bundle packages.
